description: Main source file for a Flutter mobile application implementing a furniture shopping interface with health check and navigation.

classes.name: FurnitureApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, setting up the MaterialApp and theme.

classes.name: SplashGate
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the initial health check and screen transitions.

classes.name: SplashScreen
classes.description: Screen shown during startup, with a Flutter logo and progress indicator.

classes.name: ErrorScreen
classes.description: Screen presented when health check fails, allowing retries.

classes.name: _HelpNote
classes.description: A small help note widget displaying connection tips.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main screen with tab navigation for products, settings, and help.

classes.name: ProductsPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder list of products with static entries.

classes.name: HelpPage
classes.description: Page displaying help and connection info, including current base URL.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initial entry point that initializes Flutter binding, loads environment variables, and runs the app.
